resources.string: Server not reachable or Banshee with remote control plugin is not running on host.
Host went offline or Banshee was closed.

A higher value will lower the needed request amount to keep the UI up to date. This saves battery and traffic so is great for mobile network remote. But external(!) player status changes will be reported delayed.
Remote server doesn\'t provide a database!
Current database is already up to date...
Failed to write database to SD card or it is corrupted!
Unknown track detected. A database synchronization might fix it...
Will try to contact last chosen server on app start
Won\'t try to contact last chosen server on app start but show server list
Music will be stopped on incoming call
Music won\'t be stopped on incoming call
You can use volume keys to control banshee volume
Volume keys won\'t control banshee volume
If previous playlist track is from same album all following will only display the track title
Every playlist item will have a cover, artist name and album title
When a unknown track is detected you will get a hint that your database might be outdated
Hints of a possibly outdated database will be suppressed (not recommended)
Genre of song (if available) will be shown after song title
Year of album (if available) will be shown after album title
Number of playlist tracks which will be loaded from server in one cycle (prevent loading of huge lists)
Interval in seconds in which the banshee server will be polled for changes when using WiFi
Interval in seconds in which the banshee server will be polled for changes when using mobile network
If cover is not cached it will be loaded from server
Cover will be tried to load from the cache only (if it was loaded with WiFi before)
